description: The user attacks with a punch that may lower the target’s Defense stat. It’s also one of the Pokétch’s hidden moves.

name: TM099
description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

name: TM099
description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

name: TM099
description: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

name: TM099
description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It’s also one of the Pokétch’s hidden moves.

name: TM100
description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM100
description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM100
description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: TM100
description: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It’s also one of the Pokétch’s hidden moves.
